data.1: BLESSED BE HE who holds the (reins of) Kingship in His hand, who has power over everything,
data.2: Who created death and life in order to try you to see who of you are best of deed. He is all-mighty and forgiving,
data.3: Who created the seven skies one above the other. Do you see any disproportion in the creations of Ar-Rahman? Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?
data.4: Turn your eyes again and again. Your gaze turns back dazed and tired.
data.5: We have adorned the lowest sky with lamps, and made them missiles against the devils, for whom We have prepared a torment of most intense fire.
data.6: For those who believe not in their Lord there is the punishment of Hell; and what a wretched destination
data.7: When they are cast into it, they will hear it roar and raging
data.8: As though it would burst with fury. Every time a crowd is thrown into it, its wardens will ask: "Did no warner come to you?"
data.9: And they will answer: "Surely; a warner came to us, but we denied him, and said: ´God did not send down any thing; you are greatly deluded, in fact.´"
data.10: They will say: "If we had listened and been wise, we would not have been among the inmates of Hell."
data.11: So will they confess their guilt. Deprived (of all joys) will be the inmates of Hell.
data.12: For those who fear their Lord in secret is forgiveness and a great reward.
data.13: Whether you say a thing secretly or openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
data.14: Can He who has created not know (His creation)? He is all-penetrating, all-aware.
data.15: It is lie who made the earth subservient to you that you may travel all around it, and eat of things He has provided; and to Him will be your resurrection.
data.16: Are you so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not open up the earth to swallow you, when it will begin to tremble?
data.17: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you? Then you will know the import of My commination!
data.18: Those before them had also denied. And how was My punishment then!
data.19: Do they not see the birds above them flying wings spread out or folded? Nothing holds them aloft but God. All things are within His purview.
data.20: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman? The unbelievers are surely lost in delusion.
data.21: Who is there to give you food in case He withholds His bounty? Yet they persist in rebellion and aversion.
data.22: Will he find the way who grovels flat on his face, or he who walks straight on the right path?
data.23: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
data.24: Say: "It is He who dispersed you all over the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
data.25: But they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"
data.26: Say: "God alone has knowledge. My duty is only to warn you clearly."
data.27: When they realise it has come upon them, distraught will be the faces of unbelievers. They will be told: "This is what you asked for."
data.28: Say: "Just think: If God destroys me and those with me, or is benevolent to us, who will then protect the unbelievers from a painful doom?"
data.29: Say: "He is the benevolent; in Him do we believe, and in Him do we place our trust. You will now realise who is in manifest error."
data.30: Say: "Just think: If your water were to dry up in the morning who will bring you water from a fresh, flowing stream?"
